text: 'inma jaza' aladhin yuharibun allh, wybarzwnh baledawt, wyetdwn ealaa ahkamh, waealaa 'ahkam rswlh, wayufsidun fi al'ard biqatl alanfs, wasalb alamwal, 'ana yuqattalu، 'aw yusallabu mae alqatl (walslb: 'ana yushadd aljani ealaa khshb) 'aw tuqtae yd almharb alyumnaa wrjlh alysra, fa'iin lam yatub tuqte yduh alyusraa wrjluh alymna، 'aw yunfau 'iilaa balad ghyr bldhm, wyuhbsu fi sijn dhlk albalad hataa tazhr twbtuhm. whdha aljaza' aldhy aeddah allah llmharbyn hu dhl fi aldnya, walahum fi alakhirat eadhab shadid 'iin lam ytwbu
